attributes.action: Safe guard the free banking that individuals in credit currently enjoy.  Further, we call upon the Prime Minister to keep bank charges fair for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last six months there have been rumbling withing the banking industry of an end to the free banking we currently enjoy when we are in credit.  The banks would like to charge all customers to maintain a bank account, the argument being that this could make bank charges fairer.

Barcleys have again announced record profits, clearly there is scope for the bank industry to make bank charges fairer within the current system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
